name: International Organization to Preserve Human Rights
goal:
Aims & Objectives
IOPHR's aim focuses on preserving and advancing the democratic values that we hold dear in order to thrive on our diversity, based on the principle of human rights and freedom of religion or belief that are universal and should be equally available to every single human being, irrespective of one’s race, culture, gender or faith.
IOPHR also focuses on combating gender-inequality, cultural and religious antagonism, and the growing threats of radicalization and extremism, and social inequity.
IOPHR aims to make awareness through policy and advocacy, education to counter the threats posed by extremism under the name of Islam, by using the principles of human rights.
Due to the Iranian government promoting radicalization and extremism under the name of Islam IOPHR raises awareness on Human Rights violations in Iran and what happens when an extremist ideology takes control of society.
IOPHR supports the Iranian population in Iran in their fight for the respect of Civil- and Human Rights values and to spread awareness about the brutal injustices by the Iranian authorities to women, religious and ethnic minorities, political opponents, lawyers, journalists, bloggers, students and human rights activists.
interests: Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Youth
